title: Patch update stuck
body:
So, im downloading a patch that just stays at 260/261 mb and keeps going up and down in kbps from 2 and 3. This has been continuously been happening and don't know whats up with it. If i could get something that could help me with this problem would be great.

PS. It also is making my comp very laggy going from 70ms to well over 3000ms

replies.body: Does the patching process fail at any point? Sometimes, depending on disk speed, your process could visually look like it's stopping, but until you get an error, I recommend letting it do its thing. Let it run for a while, and if it errors out, let me know at what percentage and what error message you get.
